sentences: Olemme odottaneet heid√§n tulevat jo tunnin.
context: The word 'tulevat' is the third-person plural present indicative form of the verb 'tulla', which means 'to come'. It can also be the nominative plural of the adjective 'tuleva', meaning 'future'. Therefore, it translates to 'coming', 'are coming', or 'future ones' depending on context. The word is inflected based on person and number; here it refers to 'they'.
